subject: defective pedals
description_text:
Hello I purchased a set of you guys pro plus racing pedals back in May of
this year on you guys Amazon storefront and they just started developing an
issue where they have just started having ghost inputs as if they were
being pressed and then started disconnecting all together from my rig. I
seen I have a 12 month defective warranty on these and wondered how do we
get the process started for a replacement set shipped to me.

Thanks pedals were wonderful till this issue started happening. Attached is
the invoice from Amazon.

conversations.body_text: Hi Travis McCorkle,  Could you please provide us with some pictures of the problem? Or a video about it? We will check the problem.

sure here is a screenshot of the pedals app nothing is being pressed in
this picture, also the brake pedals is twitching between 1-4% of input
racing is almost like i'm dragging the brake the whole race even after i
set the threshold and recalibrate. Also tried updating the app wouldn't let
me update as the app fails to load after update. Also lose of pedal input
happened mid race in LMU and its completely random, it has happened in
Iracing several times also completely random but will happen during one of
my racing sessions guaranteed


On Sat, Dec 13, 2025 at 02:04 support@simsonn.com

Hi Travis McCorkle, Please try to follow the steps below:  Press and hold the upgrade button on the PlusX main controller, then reconnect the USB cable.  Open SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 and check if it has entered recovery mode.  If recovery mode is detected, go to Settings → Update → Manual Update Firmware → pedals → firmware → pedals-plusx.sfu.  After the update is complete, test the device to see if it has been restored successfully.

Updated software after a uninstall and redownload of the new version, main
controller cant update due to it saying "incorrect file version talk to
admin"

attached screenshot

also still getting jitter and random dc of pedals in race
